files.name: Cg4
files.data:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html>
<head>
  <meta charset="UTF-8">
  <title>Omniverse Pulse</title>
  <style>
    html, body {
      margin: 0;
      padding: 0;
      overflow: hidden;
      background: black;
    }
    canvas {
      display: block;
    }
  </style>
  <script src="https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/p5.js/1.6.0/p5.min.js"></script>
</head>
<body>
<script>
let stars = [], nebula = [], rings = [], pulses = [];
let numStars = 2500;
let numRings = 50;
let t = 0;

function setup() {
  createCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight, WEBGL);
  colorMode(HSB, 360, 100, 100, 100);
  
  for (let i = 0; i < numStars; i++) {
    stars.push({
      x: random(-2000, 2000),
      y: random(-2000, 2000),
      z: random(-2000, 2000),
      size: random(0.2, 1.5),
      hue: random(0, 360)
    });
  }

  for (let i = 0; i < 1000; i++) {
    nebula.push({
      angle: random(TWO_PI),
      dist: random(200, 1200),
      y: random(-400, 400),
      speed: random(0.001, 0.01),
      hue: random(180, 300)
    });
  }

  for (let i = 0; i < numRings; i++) {
    rings.push({ r: i * 40 + 200, offset: random(TWO_PI) });
  }

  for (let i = 0; i < 400; i++) {
    pulses.push({
      x: random(-800, 800),
      y: random(-800, 800),
      z: random(-800, 800),
      amp: random(5, 30),
      freq: random(0.01, 0.05),
      size: random(4, 12),
      phase: random(TWO_PI)
    });
  }

  noStroke();
}

function draw() {
  background(0);
  rotateX(map(mouseY, 0, height, -PI / 2, PI / 2));
  rotateY(map(mouseX, 0, width, -PI, PI));
  rotateZ(sin(frameCount * 0.002) * 0.1);
  t += 1;

  // Stars
  for (let s of stars) {
    push();
    translate(s.x, s.y, s.z);
    fill(s.hue, 80, 100, 80);
    sphere(s.size);
    pop();
  }

  // Pulses
  for (let p of pulses) {
    let wave = sin(t * p.freq + p.phase) * p.amp;
    push();
    translate(p.x, p.y + wave, p.z);
    fill((frameCount * 0.5 + p.amp * 3) % 360, 100, 100, 90);
    sphere(p.size);
    pop();
  }

  // Nebula
  for (let n of nebula) {
    n.angle += n.speed;
    let x = cos(n.angle) * n.dist;
    let z = sin(n.angle) * n.dist;
    push();
    translate(x, n.y + sin(t * 0.01 + x * 0.001) * 20, z);
    fill(n.hue, 80, 90, 40);
    sphere(2);
    pop();
  }

  // Galactic core
  push();
  ambientLight(20);
  pointLight(255, 255, 255, 0, 0, 200);
  fill((frameCount * 2) % 360, 100, 100);
  sphere(60 + sin(frameCount * 0.05) * 20);
  pop();

  // Rings
  for (let r of rings) {
    push();
    noFill();
    stroke(255, 50);
    beginShape();
    for (let a = 0; a < TWO_PI; a += PI / 90) {
      let x = cos(a + r.offset + t * 0.002) * r.r;
      let y = sin(a + r.offset + t * 0.002) * r.r;
      let z = sin(a * 3 + t * 0.005 + r.r * 0.001) * 150;
      vertex(x, y, z);
    }
    endShape(CLOSE);
    pop();
  }
}

function windowResized() {
  resizeCanvas(windowWidth, windowHeight);
}
</script>
</body>
</html>

files.name: Art1 V01
files.data:
<!DOCTYPE html>
<html><head><title>Viral Art</title><style>body{margin:0}canvas{display:block}</style></head><body>
<canvas id="c"></canvas>
<script>
let c=document.getElementById("c"),x=c.getContext("2d"),w,h,p=[],n=122,t=0;
function s(){w=window.innerWidth;h=window.innerHeight;c.width=w;c.height=h;
x.fillStyle="hsl(359, 23%, 2%)";x.fillRect(0,0,w,h);for(let i=0;i<n;i++)p.push({x:Math.random()*w,y:Math.random()*h,z:Math.random()*200,vx:(Math.random()-.5)*3.59,vy:(Math.random()-.5)*1.75,vz:(Math.random()-.5)*3.54,h:Math.random()*360});}
function d(){x.fillStyle="rgba(0,0,0,0.07)";x.fillRect(0,0,w,h);t+=.02;
for(let i=0;i<n;i++){let a=p[i];a.x+=a.vx;a.y+=a.vy;a.z+=a.vz;a.h=(a.h+2.17)%360;
if(a.x<0||a.x>w)a.vx*=-1;if(a.y<0||a.y>h)a.vy*=-1;if(a.z<0||a.z>200)a.vz*=-1;
let s=200/(200+a.z);x.beginPath();x.arc(a.x,a.y,5.38*s,0,2*Math.PI);
x.fillStyle=`hsla(${a.h},82%,70%,${s})`;x.fill();}
for(let i=0;i<n;i++)for(let j=i+1;j<n;j++){let a=p[i],b=p[j],dx=a.x-b.x,dy=a.y-b.y,dz=a.z-b.z,d=(dx*dx+dy*dy+dz*dz)**0.5;
if(d<118){x.beginPath();x.moveTo(a.x,a.y);x.lineTo(b.x,b.y);
x.strokeStyle=`hsla(${(a.h+b.h)/2},83%,95%,${1-d/118})`;x.stroke();}}
if(c.m){let mx=c.mx,my=c.my;for(let i=0;i<n;i++){let a=p[i],dx=mx-a.x,dy=my-a.y,d=(dx*dx+dy*dy)**0.5;
if(d>1){a.vx+=dx/d*0.137;a.vy+=dy/d*0.137;}}}
requestAnimationFrame(d);}
window.onresize=s;c.onmousedown=e=>{c.m=1;c.mx=e.clientX;c.my=e.clientY;};
c.onmouseup=()=>{c.m=0;};c.onmousemove=e=>{c.mx=e.clientX;c.my=e.clientY;};
s();d();
</script></body></html>
